nostrauth-desc: Allow users to login with Nostr NIP-07 browser extension
nostrauth-login-instructions: Click the button below to login using your Nostr browser extension.
nostrauth-pubkey-help: Your Nostr public key. You can paste the 64-character hex pubkey (from a NIP-07 extension) or an npub1... bech32 key.
nostrauth-pubkey-invalid: Invalid Nostr public key format. Expected 64 hex characters or an npub1... bech32 key.
nostrauth-import-failed: Failed to get public key from Nostr extension
nostrauth-import-invalid: Invalid public key format from extension
